roleset.name: pay back

example.name: transitive--note the arg3!
example.text: In all, the company hopes to repay $45 million in debt through the sales, which will completely discharge its secured debt, the company said.
example.arg: through the sales, which will completely discharge its secured debt,

example.name: args 1 2 3
example.text: The merger agreement says [the buy-out group]-1 is entitled *trace-1* to be repaid *trace* $26.7 million in fees for its investment bankers, Lazard Freres & Co. and Salomon Brothers Inc., and its law firm, Paul Weiss Rifkind Wharton & Garrison.
example.arg: its investment bankers, Lazard Freres & Co. and Salomon Brothers Inc., and its law firm, Paul Weiss Rifkind Wharton & Garrison.

example.name: price as subject
example.text: The buy-out group is also entitled to $16 million [0]-1 *trace*-1 to repay a fund created by the pilots union for an employee stock ownership plan.
example.arg: a fund created by the pilots union for an employee stock ownership plan.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: He thought that we had n't properly repaid him once we had grown up , and felt quite bitter about it .

roleset.note: REPAY-V NOTES: Comparison with 'pay'. Member of Vncls pay-68, judgement-33. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from repay.01-v)
